trans-unit.source: description: This topic shows you how to launch the compose SMS dialog to allow the user to send an SMS message.
trans-unit.target: description: This topic shows you how to launch the compose SMS dialog to allow the user to send an SMS message.

trans-unit.source: You can pre-populate the fields of the SMS with data before showing the dialog.
trans-unit.target: You can pre-populate the fields of the SMS with data before showing the dialog.

trans-unit.source: The message will not be sent until the user taps the send button.
trans-unit.target: The message will not be sent until the user taps the send button.

trans-unit.source: title: Send an SMS message ms.assetid: 4D7B509B-1CF0-4852-9691-E96D8352A4D6 keywords: 'contacts, SMS, send
trans-unit.target: title: Send an SMS message ms.assetid: 4D7B509B-1CF0-4852-9691-E96D8352A4D6 keywords: 'contacts, SMS, send

trans-unit.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: This topic shows you how to launch the compose SMS dialog to allow the user to send an SMS message.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows you how to launch the compose SMS dialog to allow the user to send an SMS message.

trans-unit.source: You can pre-populate the fields of the SMS with data before showing the dialog.
trans-unit.target: You can pre-populate the fields of the SMS with data before showing the dialog.

trans-unit.source: The message will not be sent until the user taps the send button.
trans-unit.target: The message will not be sent until the user taps the send button.

trans-unit.source: Create a new [**ChatMessage**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn642160) object and set the data that you want to be pre-populated in the compose email dialog.
trans-unit.target: Create a new [**ChatMessage**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn642160) object and set the data that you want to be pre-populated in the compose email dialog.

trans-unit.source: This topic has shown you how to launch the compose SMS dialog.
trans-unit.target: This topic has shown you how to launch the compose SMS dialog.

trans-unit.source: For information on selecting contacts to use as recipients for an SMS message, see [Select contacts](selecting-contacts.md).
trans-unit.target: For information on selecting contacts to use as recipients for an SMS message, see [Select contacts](selecting-contacts.md).

trans-unit.source: Download the [Universal Windows app samples](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619979) from GitHub to see more examples of how to send and receive SMS messages by using a background task.
trans-unit.target: Download the [Universal Windows app samples](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619979) from GitHub to see more examples of how to send and receive SMS messages by using a background task.
